name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lexsee - AI Language and Reading Companion

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI companion that helps everyone read better and more fluently, with features especially for people with dyslexic brains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
•	Use on any webpage solo or in groups
•	Make notes, share & chat
•	Text to speech makes comprehension easier
•	Practice pronunciation
•	Helpful AI reading hints
•	Instant definitions

Lexsee is free and private for you to use. We don’t collect personal information.
